item.title: Ubervotebot
item.description: A Telegram bot to create polls with. Thousands of people love it. The results can be shown in a number of different ways, see the screenshots for a preview of how it might look. Polls will look like this: And results can look like this: This project could not have happened without @yukuku’s bot starter kit, go check it out. Please note There is no limit on the amount of polls you can create, but if you create too many, the /result command will not work.
